3813.verse: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"

3814.verse: But they, that Day, are in surrender.

3815.verse: And they will approach one another blaming each other.

3816.verse: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."

3817.verse: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,

3818.verse: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.

3819.verse: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].

3820.verse: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."

3821.verse: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.

3822.verse: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.

3823.verse: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant

3824.verse: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"

3825.verse: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.

3826.verse: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,

3827.verse: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -

3828.verse: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

3829.verse: Those will have a provision determined -

3830.verse: Fruits; and they will be honored

3833.verse: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,

3834.verse: White and delicious to the drinkers;

3835.verse: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.

3836.verse: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,

3837.verse: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.

3838.verse: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

3839.verse: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]
